name: Beru Lars (V)
Lore: 'Wife of Owen Lars and guardian of Luke Skywalker. Quietly lobbied Owen to allow Luke to attend Academy. Maintains Lars'' farm hydroponics labs.',
Text: 'Once per turn, if present at a farm and a destiny was just drawn that is within 1 of the destiny of your ''crop,'' may use 1 Force to place ''crop'' in Used Pile. Whenever you play Beru Stew or Blue Milk, may draw top card from your Reserve Deck.',
